biotools.summary: Automatic Parametrization of Bonded Terms in MARTINI-Based Coarse-Grained Models of Simple to Complex Molecules via Fuzzy Self-Tuning Particle Swarm Optimization. Swarm-CG is designed for automatically optimizing the bonded terms of a MARTINI-based coarse-grained (CG) molecular model, in explicit or implicit solvent, with respect to a reference all-atom (AA) trajectory and starting from a preliminary CG model (topology and non-bonded parameters). The package is designed for usage with Gromacs and contains 3 modules for:. Evaluating the bonded parametrization of a CG model. Optimizing bonded terms of a CG model.

bioschemas.name: iSwarm-CG
